title: Graph of f, given grah of f'

content.question: The figure above shows graph of f′, the derivative of f. The domain of f is the set of all x such that 0 < x < 2. (a) Write an expression for f′(x) in terms of x.

frqParts.text: The figure above shows graph of f′, the derivative of f. The domain of f is the set of all x such that 0 < x < 2. (a) Write an expression for f′(x) in terms of x.
(b) Given that f(1) = 0, write an expression for f(x) in terms of x.
(c) In the xy-plane provided below, sketch the graph of y = f(x).

topic.text: 5.8: Sketching Graphs of Functions and Their Derivatives

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
